comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Quote from: istemi Uzay on September 11, 2023, 06:38:28 PMHello, soon I will tell you about the scandals regarding the employees, supreme board and referees of a large stock exchange and you will see how bad this stock exchange is.If you're not yet ready then don't create a thread yet because we have no topic to discuss here You're violating the rules of this board and you have to be specific and not make it general.You should create your complaint in a correct format tooScam Report FormatCode:[b][color=black]What happened:: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Scammers Profile Link: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Reference Link: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Amount Scammed: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Payment Method: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Proof of Payment: [/color][/b][b][color=black]PM/Chat Logs: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Additional Notes: [/color][/b]

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Quote from: istemi Uzay on September 11, 2023, 06:38:28 PMHello, soon I will tell you about the scandals regarding the employees, supreme board and referees of a large stock exchange and you will see how bad this stock exchange is.This forum primarily focuses on discussions about Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies. I doubt that many people here are particularly interested in some stock exchange and what is happening there. You could still share the information, but perhaps it's best to move the topic to the Off-topic section, as I don't see a more fitting board for it.

comments.author: The Sceptical Chymist
comments.body: Quote from: decodx on September 11, 2023, 09:46:28 PMThis forum primarily focuses on discussions about Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies. I doubt that many people here are particularly interested in some stock exchange and what is happening there.Well I sure as hell would be--but this would not be the correct section for it (Economics would be my first thought), and I seriously doubt a brand new member is going to be dropping a bomb about a legitimate stock exchange on a forum about bitcoin.  Scandals just aren't revealed that way.  If anyone's got enough poop on a big enough organization such that it'd be newsworthy, they'd go to the press.But hey, lookin' forward to all the juiciness OP promises to post (lol).

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: decodx on September 11, 2023, 09:46:28 PMThis forum primarily focuses on discussions about Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies. I doubt that many people here are particularly interested in some stock exchange and what is happening there. Since his post looks like it was written using google translate, maybe by ":stock exchange" he actually means crypto exchange as I've seen people calling it that way. Quote from: istemi Uzay on September 12, 2023, 12:29:57 PMMy account is new, I cannot post on reddit, you will see when the time comes.I will share it on Twitter when the time comesWell, being Nebwie doesn't stop you from sahring here and if you don't want to share any relevant info now I suggest you lock this topic (you can find that option at the bottom left part of the screen) for now and reopen once you are willing to disclose the info.

comments.author: rohang
comments.body: what is the point of this FUD spam?If  you have some  information  to expose anyone just post  it, otherwise you are just a attention seeker if your intentions are good  you should post the information as soon as possible  to prevent more  people  becoming victims and losing their money

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Quote from: istemi Uzay on September 12, 2023, 12:29:57 PMMy account is new, I cannot post on reddit, you will see when the time comes.I will share it on Twitter when the time comesFeel free to post it here, even if you're newbie. This forum has nothing to do with Reddit.But if you're not up for sharing it just yet, what's the point of this topic? Are you trying to leave us hanging in suspense?Quote from: Rikafip on September 12, 2023, 01:15:59 PMSince his post looks like it was written using google translate, maybe by ":stock exchange" he actually means crypto exchange as I've seen people calling it that way. Yep, that might just be the case. I couldn't help but throw in a little sarcasm there.
